Specimen Type: Whole blood (EDTA), plasma or serum, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF)
Purpose: Qualitative detection of HIV-2 DNA/RNA in clinical specimens using real-time PCR
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood; plasma separator tube for plasma/serum; sterile container for CSF
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 Fast, Bio-Rad CFX96)
